text: Tarapara yakhana amara tamra prati mrtyubidhana karechilama takhana kichu'i tadera kache tamra mrtyu sanbandhe janate deya ni sudhu eka matira kita byatita, se kheye phelechila tamra samsa. Tarapara yakhana tara patana ghatala takhana jinera pariskarabhabe bujhalo ye yadi tara adrsyata janato tahale tara lanchanadayaka sastite abasthana karata na.
